001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.PumpStateSupplier;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.TronMessageWrapper;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.models.Packet;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
010
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
012import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.HmacAlgorithms;
013import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.HmacUtils;
014import org.apache.commons.lang3.ArrayUtils;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Arrays;
018import java.util.List;
019
020import kotlin.text.Charsets;
021
022public class Packetize {
023    public static final String TAG = "Packetize";
024    public static TransactionId txId = new TransactionId();
025
026    // TODO: these comments about chunk size are almost certainly due to the MTU.
027    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE = 18; // This was observed for currentStatus. It may be 40 for control.
028    public static final int CONTROL_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE = 40; // this is a guess, it works for control.BolusPermissionResponse. maybe it should actually be 20?
029
030    private static int determineMaxChunkSize(Message message) {
031        if (message.getCharacteristic().equals(Characteristic.CONTROL) && message.type().equals(MessageType.REQUEST)) {
032            L.d(TAG, "using maxChunkSize="+CONTROL_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE+" for control request characteristic");
033            return CONTROL_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE;
034        }
035
036        return DEFAULT_MAX_CHUNK_SIZE;
037    }
038
039    public static List<Packet> packetize(Message message, byte[] authenticationKey, byte currentTxId) {
040        return packetize(message, authenticationKey, currentTxId, determineMaxChunkSize(message));
041    }
042
043    public static List<Packet> packetize(Message message, byte[] authenticationKey, byte currentTxId, int maxChunkSize) {
044        int length = 3 + message.getCargo().length;
045        if (message.signed()) {
046            length += 24;
047        }
048        byte[] packet = new byte[length];
049        packet[0] = (byte) message.opCode();
050        packet[1] = currentTxId;
051        packet[2] = (byte) (length - 3);
052        // packet[3 ... N] filled with message cargo
053        System.arraycopy(message.getCargo(), 0, packet, 3, message.getCargo().length);
054
055        L.d(TAG, "packetize signed "+message.signed()+": packetBefore="+ Hex.encodeHexString(packet));
056        if (message.props().modifiesInsulinDelivery() && !PumpStateSupplier.actionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryEnabled.get()) {
057            throw new ActionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryNotEnabledInPumpX2Exception();
058        }
059        if (message.signed()) {
060            int i = length - 20;
061            byte[] messageData = new byte[i];
062            System.arraycopy(packet, 0, messageData, 0, i);
063            long pumpStateTimeSinceReset = PumpStateSupplier.pumpTimeSinceReset.get();
064            byte[] timeSinceReset = Bytes.toUint32(pumpStateTimeSinceReset);
065            System.arraycopy(timeSinceReset, 0, messageData, length - 24, 4);
066
067            L.d(TAG, "using authenticationKey=" + Hex.encodeHexString(authenticationKey) + " pumpTimeSinceReset=" + pumpStateTimeSinceReset);
068
069            byte[] hmacSha1Output = doHmacSha1(messageData, authenticationKey);
070            System.arraycopy(messageData, 0, packet, 0, i);
071            System.arraycopy(hmacSha1Output, 0, packet, i, hmacSha1Output.length);
072        }
073        L.d(TAG, "packetize packetAfter="+ Hex.encodeHexString(packet));
074
075        // Append CRC to packet
076        byte[] crc = Bytes.calculateCRC16(packet);
077        byte[] packetWithCRC = ArrayUtils.addAll(packet, crc);
078        L.d(TAG, "packetize packetWithCRC="+ Hex.encodeHexString(packetWithCRC));
079
080        // Fill Packet list with chunks of size 18 (maxChunkSize)
081        List<Packet> packets = new ArrayList<>();
082        List<List<Byte>> chunked = Lists.partition(Arrays.asList(ArrayUtils.toObject(packetWithCRC)), maxChunkSize);
083
084        int b = chunked.size() - 1;
085        for (List<Byte> bytes : chunked) {
086            byte[] elem = ArrayUtils.toPrimitive(bytes.toArray(new Byte[0]));
087            packets.add(new Packet((byte) b, currentTxId, elem));
088            b--;
089        }
090
091        return packets;
092    }
093
094    public static byte[] doHmacSha1(byte[] data, byte[] key) {
095        return new HmacUtils(HmacAlgorithms.HMAC_SHA_1, key).hmac(data);
096    }
097
098    public static class ActionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryNotEnabledInPumpX2Exception extends RuntimeException {
099        ActionsAffectingInsulinDeliveryNotEnabledInPumpX2Exception() {
100            super("The developer of this application has not enabled actions which affect insulin delivery");
101        }
102    }
103}
